name: oh_telemetry_collector_load_testing
description: loan test for OH Telemetry Collector Server

scripts.all: npm run rust && npm run java && npm run js
scripts.kall: npm run krust && npm run kjava && npm run kjs
scripts.rust: npm run rust:write && npm run rust:read && npm run rust:read:write
scripts.java: npm run java:write && npm run java:read && npm run java:read:write
scripts.js: npm run js:write && npm run js:read && npm run js:read:write
scripts.krust: npm run rust:kwrite && npm run rust:kread
scripts.kjava: npm run java:kwrite && npm run java:kread
scripts.kjs: npm run js:kwrite && npm run js:kread
scripts.rust:read:write: artillery run  --output reports-json/report_rust.json  configuration/load_test_rust.yml && artillery report --output reports-html/report_rust.html reports-json/report_rust.json
scripts.rust:write: artillery run  --output reports-json/report_rust_write.json  configuration/load_test_rust_write.yml && artillery report --output reports-html/report_rust_write.html reports-json/report_rust_write.json
scripts.rust:read: artillery run  --output reports-json/report_rust_read.json  configuration/load_test_rust_read.yml && artillery report --output reports-html/report_rust_read.html reports-json/report_rust_read.json
scripts.rust:kwrite: artillery run  --output reports-json/report_rust_k_write.json  configuration/load_test_rust_k_write.yml && artillery report --output reports-html/report_rust_k_write.html reports-json/report_rust_k_write.json
scripts.rust:kread: artillery run  --output reports-json/report_rust_k_read.json  configuration/load_test_rust_k_read.yml && artillery report --output reports-html/report_rust_k_read.html reports-json/report_rust_k_read.json
scripts.java:read:write: artillery run  --output reports-json/report_java.json  configuration/load_test_java.yml && artillery report --output reports-html/report_java.html reports-json/report_java.json
scripts.java:write: artillery run  --output reports-json/report_java_write.json  configuration/load_test_java_write.yml && artillery report --output reports-html/report_java_write.html reports-json/report_java_write.json
scripts.java:read: artillery run  --output reports-json/report_java_read.json  configuration/load_test_java_read.yml && artillery report --output reports-html/report_java_read.html reports-json/report_java_read.json
scripts.java:kwrite: artillery run  --output reports-json/report_java_k_write.json  configuration/load_test_java_k_write.yml && artillery report --output reports-html/report_java_k_write.html reports-json/report_java_k_write.json
scripts.java:kread: artillery run  --output reports-json/report_java_k_read.json  configuration/load_test_java_k_read.yml && artillery report --output reports-html/report_java_k_read.html reports-json/report_java_k_read.json
scripts.js:read:write: artillery run  --output reports-json/report_js.json  configuration/load_test_js.yml && artillery report --output reports-html/report_js.html reports-json/report_js.json
scripts.js:write: artillery run  --output reports-json/report_js_write.json  configuration/load_test_js_write.yml && artillery report --output reports-html/report_js_write.html reports-json/report_js_write.json
scripts.js:read: artillery run  --output reports-json/report_js_read.json  configuration/load_test_js_read.yml && artillery report --output reports-html/report_js_read.html reports-json/report_js_read.json
scripts.js:kwrite: artillery run  --output reports-json/report_js_k_write.json  configuration/load_test_js_k_write.yml && artillery report --output reports-html/report_js_k_write.html reports-json/report_js_k_write.json
scripts.js:kread: artillery run  --output reports-json/report_js_k_read.json  configuration/load_test_js_k_read.yml && artillery report --output reports-html/report_js_k_read.html reports-json/report_js_k_read.json

author: Andrei Dodu
